pages.title: Vanilla
pages.text: Vanilla is a special plant, which grows on the side of blocks like a vine. Vanilla is very rare though, and it can only be bought from the Confectioner.$(br2)Once you buy vanilla pods from a Confectioner, you can grow your own!

pages.title: Dried Vanilla Pods
pages.text: Once vanilla blooms, you can harvest its pods, and dry them in a furnace. From the dried vanilla pods, you can make the classic vanilla ice cream flavor!
